Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your recent Small Claims order.
Per your request, we have drafted a demand letter to your defendant using the information you provided in your questionnaire. Please review the attached letter and reply to this email with any revisions, or with your approval for LegalZoom to send this letter to the defendant for you.
If your defendant contacts you in an attempt to settle your dispute, or if you have any questions, please contact us by replying to this email, or feel free to call us toll-free at {!snippetVariable.ccphone} {!snippetVariable.cchours}.
We truly appreciate your business and look forward to serving your future legal document needs.
Best regards,
The LegalZoom Team
